ComicInfo.Summary:
Just as Bruce is freed from the Hulkâ€™s curse, trouble arises at the Gamma Base. The Leader returns- and imprisons Colonel Ross and Doc Samson!
The Hulk is running through the forest and then all of a sudden he changes back to human in front of all these people. He gives the lady a kiss because he's so happy, and the guy punches him and he gets mad but he doesn't turn into the Hulk. So Bruce thinks he cured,but is he, really. Also the Leader a.k.a Mr. Mccraken has token General Ross, and Doc Sampson. What will Bruce do?
